original: Hagberg, Henning Emil, civilingenjör, Norrköping, f. 2/2/78 i Norrköp. av ing. Johan Emil H. o. Lisen Maria Elisabeth Dahlström. G. 02 m. Gerda Sivard. Barn: Dagmar f. 03. — Mog:ex. i Norrköp. 96, KTH (K) 96-99. Anst. v. Norrköp. Bom-uillsväveri A-B 99-07, verkst. dir. f. Mölnlycke Väveri A-B 07-08, kousult. textiling. 08-27, verkst. dir. f. A-B Ing:firman Henning Hagberg i Norrköp. sed. 27. Skr.: Handbok i textilindustri (24), art. i textilindustr. frågor i tidn. o. tidskr.
translated: Hagberg, Henning Emil, engineer, Norrköping, b. 2/2/78 in Norrköp. to engineer Johan Emil H. and Lisen Maria Elisabeth Dahlström. Married in 1902 to Gerda Sivard. Children: Dagmar b. 1903. Graduated from Norrköp. Technical School in 1896 and from the Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) in 1896-1899. Employed by Norrköp. Bom-uillsväveri A-B from 1899 to 1907, was the managing director of Mölnlycke Väveri A-B from 1907 to 1908, textile consultant from 1908 to 1927, and has been the managing director of A-B Ing:firman Henning Hagberg in Norrköp. since 1927. Author of Handbook in Textile Industry (1924), articles on textile industry issues in newspapers and magazines.
